title: Results In The Schedule
body: Riot, please don't show the results in the Worlds schedule. I'm just trying to see which matches aired today to see which ones I wanna watch. I don't want to be spoiled. Maybe make it a button?

replies.body:
http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/vods/worlds/world_championship_2017

https://www.reddit.com/r/LoLeventVoDs/

Just bookmark one of these two spots.

The reddit one seems to update faster and has more features then the official one.
I have to agree with this one
